Package com.thalesgroup.tmgsdk.visa

Interface TokenBindingListener

  • public interface TokenBindingListener
    This callback is used to inform the result of the VisaCTFHelper.createBinding(String, String, TokenBindingListener) process.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDeviceAuthentication​(DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
      The callback for app to indicate device authentication such as biometric type.
      void onError​(TMGClientException exception)
      The callback for app to indicate the token binding to device is unsuccessful.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(IDVSession idvSession, TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      The callback for app to indicate when the activation fails.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(IDVSession idvSession, OtpActivationStatus otpActivationStatus)
      The callback for app to show the issuer activation screen in order to continue with the IDV process.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(IDVSession idvSession)
      The callback for app to indicate an activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to server.
      void onSuccess()
      The callback for app to indicate the token binding to device is successful.

    • Method Detail

      • onIssuerAuthenticationReady

        void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(IDVSession idvSession,
                                 @Nullable
                                 OtpActivationStatus otpActivationStatus)
        The callback for app to show the issuer activation screen in order to continue with the IDV process. The next step is to activate the idvSession with or without an OTP according to the selected IDVMethod.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to use for activation.
        otpActivationStatus - The OTP activation status. In cases where the IDVType is IDVType.APP_TO_APP, IDVType.CUSTOMER_SERVICE, or IDVType.OUTBOUND_CALL this value will be null.

      • onIssuerAuthenticationRequired

        void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(IDVSession idvSession)
        The callback for app to indicate an activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to server. The next step is to show the available IDVMethod and select one from the list.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to use for activation.

      • onIssuerAuthenticationError

        void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(@Nullable
                                 IDVSession idvSession,
                                 TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        The callback for app to indicate when the activation fails. The binding session is kept opened and it is possible to retry.
        Parameters:
        idvSession - The object to use for activation. This is returned when it is possible to retry the activation.
        tmgClientException - Returns the error code and message.
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_WRONG_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_IDV_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_EXPIRED_OTP
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
        • TMGClientException.ISSUER_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_OTP

      • onDeviceAuthentication

        void onDeviceAuthentication​(DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
        The callback for app to indicate device authentication such as biometric type.
        Parameters:
        deviceAuthentication - The object to start the authentication.

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        The callback for app to indicate the token binding to device is successful.

      • onError

        void onError​(TMGClientException exception)
        The callback for app to indicate the token binding to device is unsuccessful.
        Parameters:
        exception - Returns the error code and message.
        Possible errors:
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_PARAMETERS
        • TMGClientException.JSON_PARSING_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION_PARAM
        • TMGClientException.DEVICE_AUTHENTICATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • TMGClientException.CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.TOKEN_NOT_BOUNDED
        • TMGClientException.TOKEN_ALREADY_BOUNDED
        • TMGClientException.TOKEN_DEVICE_BINDING_DECLINED
        • TMGClientException.ATTESTATION_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.INVALID_IDV_METHOD
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_IDV_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_NO_SESSION_FOUND
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_CRYPTO_ERROR
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_INVALID_TOKEN_STATE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_IS_NOT_ACCESSIBLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_RETRYABLE
        • TMGClientException.SERVER_ERROR
